Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory81.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Wow, this place is massive! I didn't know there's a whoppin' fortress here on the sea!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't rock the boat...", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: "Seeing that he can't get Nanami to listen, Watanabe turns to the rest of you, who are sorting out equipment."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Who put her on this op?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'No idea how she even found us...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I heeaarrd you! You guys are badmouthing Nanami, aren't you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sorry', 3: '14', 4: "We weren't doing anything of the sort"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm still mad... but since it's you, Commandant... I'll let it slide!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I heard it, though! Nanami reserves the right to punish Commandant 【kuroname】 how Nanami sees fit!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Shh, quiet down. We're almost there.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The speedboat comes to a halt next to a rock close to the fortress base.', 5: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Here is fine. Thank you.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'What Watanabe-San asks, we fulfill!', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'You were the one who put an end to our seventeen-year civil war, after all!', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Just doing my job, son.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We are all descendants of the soldiers in the old days. The dead don't hold grudges, so neither do we.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Those things that used to differentiate soldiers from each other... uniforms, titles, callsigns... they no longer exist.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The soldiers of this era... we fight together, for a common cause.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "We descendants of the Forsaken shall work our hardest to achieve Mr. Watanabe's goal!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Hmm. Remember to come pick us up in two days.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I thought it looked colossal from the distance. But now that we're getting closer—", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The size of it is truly intimidating...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Wouldn't be a doomsday fortress built in the post-Pandemic Age if it didn't have a decent size.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's different from doomsday fortresses built during the world wars or the cold war era.", 4: '3'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The doomsday fortresses built during the Post-Pandemic Age were always designed so that the inhabitants never had to leave if they didn't want to. The owner probably spent lots of money on it.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But I don't see anyone in there.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah. In the fortress, people could have hidden away from the Punishing Virus...', 4: '3'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...The only thing they couldn't hide from was conscription. Besides, the location of this fortress is perfect. With a pair of binoculars, you could surveil the entire bay.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Yeah. When times are tough, humans are worse than any calamity.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Anyway, we need to find a way inside.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If we want to get into the fortress, we must get through the "counteractive corridors" on the outside.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "For an attacker to invade, they would first have to find the fortress' weak points in the counteractive corridors, which are riddled with hardpoints.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The hardpoints should no longer be in use, but... expect lots of roaming Corrupted.', 4: '3'}
